original_title: SJB strongman P. Harrison pledges support to Ranil, says 20 more will join
original_body_lines: Former Minister and Anuradhapura District MP who is the District Head of Samagi Jana Balawegaya ( SJB) P. Harrison has pledged his support to President Ranil Wickremesinghe.
The former minister told the media that he had decided to support the President as he had created a future for the country.
"There was a time when a politician could not come in public and hold a meeting but Mr. Wickremesinghe had changed everything and brought about stability," he said.
"Around 20 seniors SJBers will join the President shortly, " he added. (Yohan Perera)
